Title: The Cave of the Yellow Dog
Writer: Abel Cantou (english adaptation: original version with subtitles), Byambasuren Davaa, Michael P. Greco (adaptation), Gantuya Lhavga (tale: The Cave of the Yellow Dog)
Actors: Batchuluun Urjindorj, Buyandulam Daramdadi, Nansal Batchuluun, Nansalmaa Batchuluun
Plot: The little nomad girl Nansal finds a baby dog in the Mongolian veld, who becomes her best friend - against all rejections of her parents. A story about a Mongolian family of nomads - their ...
